summary: Provides a full-featured implementation for parsing, constructing, and manipulating IEEE 802.11 (Wi‑Fi) frames, including MAC headers, control, data, management, and security (WEP/WPA/WPA2) frames, together with RadioTap, LLC, SNAP and information‑element utilities.
business_intent: Facilitates wireless network analysis, penetration testing, and forensic investigations by allowing developers and security tools to dissect, craft, and modify 802.11 packets for protocol research and security assessments.
